SonoQuest now presents a credible business case with strong market timing, though it still needs refinement in go-to-market specifics and competitive positioning to be truly investment-ready.
strengths: Excellent competitive analysis now covering 10+ major players including Laerdal, 3B Scientific, Simulab, addressing the previous critical gap
Realistic revenue projections targeting $500K ARR Year 1, aligned with medical education SaaS benchmarks versus fantasy $1.5M claims
Removed impossible '50,000 scan recordings' claim, replaced with credible cloud-based physics engine approach
Strong market timing with verified 2024 data - NVIDIA medical imaging APIs and GE's $40.5M Intelligent Ultrasound acquisition

$10K MRR from 5 pilot programs in Month 3 implies $2K/month per pilot - aggressive for unproven product with educational institutions
